mapper.select: SELECT userId FROM tb_user WHERE userName=#{userName} AND password=#{password}
SELECT a.roleId AS value,a.roleName AS label FROM tb_role as a,tb_user_role b WHERE a.status=true AND a.roleId=b.roleId AND b.userId=#{userId}
SELECT b.pid as parentId,b.menuId as value ,b.* FROM tb_role_menu a,tb_menu b WHERE a.menuId=b.menuId AND a.roleId=#{roleId}
